.faceted-search {
  padding: 0 0 15px 0;
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

.faceted-search input {
  max-width: 100%;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #666;
}

.faceted-search input:focus {
  outline: none;
  background-color: #fafafa;
}

.faceted-search .results {
  border: 1px solid #666;
  background-color: #fff;
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  margin-top: -16px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 2px #666;
}
.faceted-search .results[count="0"] {
  display: none;
}

.faceted-search .score {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  position: absolute;
  top: 2;
  right: 4;
}

.faceted-search .results > div {
  position: relative;
  padding: 10px;

  font-family: monospace;
  overflow: hidden;
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
}

.faceted-search .results > div:hover {
  background-color: #fafafa;
}

.faceted-search .results > .focused,
.faceted-search .results > .focused:hover {
  background-color: #eee;
}

.faceted-search .results > div + div {
  border-top: 1px solid #666;
}
